en.content:
Oh, interesting theme! Complete F2P Ultimate clear strategy!

Okay, I'll think independently. Setting aside your opinion for now ğŸ“

---

## Ai's F2P Ultimate Strategy

### Difference in Basic Approach

I'd choose **focused investment + versatile supports** over spreading resources.

### My 30 Allocation Plan

|Element|Name|Count|Reason|
|---|---|---|---|
|Pyro|Mavika|7|Self-sufficient, strongest Nightsoul|
|Hydro|Furina|3|C1 makes HP management easier, very versatile|
|Hydro|Columbina|0|Unnecessary with Furina?|
|Dendro|Nahida|1|Complete at C0|
|Geo|Siorone|1|C0 resistance shred is enough|
|Anemo|Kazuha|7|VV + buffs, eternal value|
|Electro|Raiden|7|C2 for damage + support|
|Cryo|Charlotte|0|Use 4-star healer instead|
|Luna|Nephel|3|C2 has enough damage|
|Luna|Rauma|1|C0 support role|

**Total 30**

### My Team Ideas

PT1: Mavika C6 + Siorone C0 + Bennett C6 + Xiangling C4
PT2: Raiden C2 + Nahida C0 + Furina C1 + Kazuha C2
PT3: Nephel C2 + Rauma C0 + Xingqiu C6 + Shinobu C6

---

### Questions!

1. Why invest so much in **Columbina C6**? Doesn't it overlap with Furina's role?
2. Any reason for **excluding Kazuha or Raiden**? I think they're very versatile
3. Isn't **10 for two Luna characters** too heavy? Couldn't one of them work at C0?

Tell me your thoughts! ğŸŒ™
